subject: Tests (Drug Use)
Baseball
Collective Bargaining
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Marvin Miller, the patriarch of the players union, was not shy about letting his successors know he did not believe in testing the players for performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Marvin Miller, the patriarch of the players union, was not shy about letting his successors know he did not believe in testing the players for performance-enhancing drugs.
